info.name: Userscripts-mirror Helper v.10
info.description:
Userscipts-mirror.org is an archive of the defunct Userscipts.com.
Not all of these possiblity /  links etc.. are fully functionnal:
 This Userstyles provides visual helper marks which indicate which links are available - or not - when you use it.

<mark>▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)</mark>
info.additionalInfo: ► NEW USO :8080 is down too! ► To follow this userscripts.org story and found the last tweaks: userscripts.org is down, but... ► NOW you can Use "userscripts-mirror.org", the Static Mirror Of userscripts. with the help of this Greasemonkey script: uso-mirror (greasy Fork) by trespassersW: Useful when searching for script via google, this userscript Redirects userscripts.org links to userscripts-mirror.org , the Static Mirror Of userscripts.org . Also redirects userscripts.org:8080 links (which stop to work now). You can find Alternatives and news about Userscripts.org here: ► Userscripts.org down for good? Here are alternatives ► greasyfork.org/forum/discussion/150/userscripts-org-is-do... ► WEBSITE DOWN FOR MOST USERS (on USO MIRROR) ► Partial mirror in process Others Alternatives Sites: Greasy Fork (very good) OpenUserJS.org (challenger) GitHub (Pro alternative) MonkeyGuts (defunct) WebExtender.net, (defunct and strange redirection)
